item.description:
$21 for a Summer Excursion with Tubing, Globe Ride, and Pizza ($39.50 Value)

One globe ride (a $20 value)
Three hours of tubing (a $17 value)
One slice of pizza (a $2.50 value)

Two summer tubing lanes send visitors flying downhill on inner tubes before an automated conveyor belt returns them to the top in 90-seconds. After three hours of heart-racing tubing, a globe ride sends guests careening down the hill in a self-contained plastic sphere. The ride can be attempted dry, with riders strapped into a harness, or wet, with up to three riders sloshing around in up to 10 gallons of water for what Amesbury Sports Park describes as a self-contained, human washing machine.
